content: Delhi traffic is so slow, the BJP and AAP have formed a coalition government by the time you cross the first speed breaker. #DelhiTraffic
Our power grid is so stable, it's like a government promise: you know it's going to fail, but you still hope it won't during your favorite show. #PowerCut
The power cut is so bad, even the government's excuses are now running on inverter backup. #PowerCut
The monsoon has finally arrived, but don't worry, our GDP growth projections are still more fictional than the 'good boy' backstory of a Salman Khan character. #MonsoonUpdate
Indian startup funding has become a game of musical chairs where the music is a remix of 'Challa' and the only one sitting is the bank that gave the founders a personal loan.
Delhi traffic so slow, Kejriwal's next guarantee is to make your car move at the speed of his investigation updates. #DelhiTraffic
#EveningRush is just the nation’s largest open-air audition for a role in a post-apocalyptic film where everyone’s character motivation is crippling regret.
Now my car's fuel tank has a better ROI than my mutual funds. #PetrolPrice
Now when you fill petrol, the pump asks for your Aadhaar, PAN, and a sworn affidavit that you won't use it to escape this reality. #PetrolPrice
Our evening traffic is now a govt 'slow TV' project: a 4-hour live stream of a single pothole evolving into a sentient being that swallows Ola drivers. #EveningRush
